title: When will Fortnite 2 come out? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not for a fair few years after Fortnite is actually complete, which it technically still isn’t. It’s still in active development despite being out for 2 years and Save the World’s story still hasn’t been done. I can see it coming out of it’s beta phase at some point in the next 12 months and maybe after that, they might start the very early stages of pre-production on a follow up but even then that means that a sequel could be 5 years plus out from that to account for development time. That could be pushed back even further if the success of Fortnite continues to last as it has rendering a sequel surplus to requirement if people are still playing their game. So for a guess with a liberal margin of error, I wouldn’t expect to see a follow up for another 6+ years.

Never. They’re just going to keep updating fortnite, theres no point in making a second fortnite because no one would switch over to that and start buying skins all over again. This is coming from a season 1 player with purple skull trooper that has spent a lot of money on the game. I cannot emphasize the word “ a lot” enough in this context.
